name: Eye Want It All Face + Eye Microneedling Set
about: What it is:A bestselling microneedling device with two attachments and a balm for visibly firmer, brighter skin and more-awake-looking eyes..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, and Dark Circles.Highlighted Ingredients:- Jojoba: Nourishes delicate under-eye skin..Ingredient Callouts:These products are vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and come in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Tackle key skin concerns with this kit, which visibly refines texture, brightens dark circles, fades fine lines, and diminishes enlarged pores. The GloPROu00ae Microneedling Rejuvenation Tool revives the look of skin and visibly enhances the benefits of topical skincare for clinical-grade results you can see and feel..This Set Contains:- GloPROu00ae Microneedling Rejuvenation Tool with GloPROu00ae FACE MicroTipu2122 Attachment Head.Clinical Results:
ingredients: -Jojoba: Nourishes delicate under-eye skin..-Olive: Protects against free-radical damage..-Persian Silk Tree Bark: Visibly minimizes dark circles...The Quench Eye Reviving Quadralipid Eye Balm:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Glyceryl Stearate, Jojoba Esters, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric/Myristic/Stearic Triglyceride, Dimethicone, Neopentyl Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Niacinamide, Tridecyl Stearate, Ethyl Macadamiate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Paraffin, PPG-12/SMDI Copolymer, PEG-100 Stearate, Beeswax/Cera Alba/Cire D'abeille, Cetyl Alcohol, Pullulan, Squalane, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Albizia Julibrissin Bark Extract, Acmella Oleracea Extract, Dipeptide Diaminobutyroyl Benzylamide Diacetate, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Centella Asiatica Extract, Malic Acid, Tocopherol, Darutoside, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Diheptyl Succinate, Hexylene Glycol, Steareth-10, Steareth-20, Sodium Polyacrylate, Xanthan Gum, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Disodium EDTA.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-On clean skin, swipe a GloPROu00ae Prep Pad Clarifying Skin Cleansing Wipe with Peptides (sold separately) over face. .-Roll GloPROu00ae FACE MicroTipu2122 Attachment Head across target areas in a combination of horizontal, vertical, and diagonal directions for a total of 60 seconds (no pressure needed). .-Use the GloPROu00ae EYE MicroTipu2122 Attachment Head to target hard-to-reach areas under and around your eyes, up to your browbone, and between brows. Spend 15 seconds on each area. .-Using the flat end of the included wand, apply The Quench Eye Reviving Quadralipid Eye Balm, then dab with fingertips until blended. .-Use the round end of the wand to gently massage and visibly depuff. ..Precautions: .-Avoid rolling GloPROu00ae Microneedling Rejuvenation Tool directly on eyelids. .-Do not use on broken or irritated skin. .-Only apply products that are not compromised or contaminated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE the Glopro microneedling kit and product. I have been using for a while now and it is the perfect way to allow my serums to penetrate deeper. My skin has improved so much and the texture is so much smoother. LOVE this kit!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A must have item!! I tried the Eye Want It All Face and Eye and it did not disappoint. I'm 53 and noticed my skin was looking dull and tired  Especially under my eyes. Tried the glow pro in my eye area along with the eye cream. Made a huge difference! Texture is smoother, black circles have lessened.  The eye cream provides so much moisture it plumps your eye with a youthful look. I keep gloq peo to 2xs a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this tool for over a year and the long term results are OBVIOUS! Even after each use, I can tell the next day that I used my GlowPro the day before. My skin literally always feels more hydrated, tighter, and brighter! Itu2019s my favorite skincare tool of anything Iu2019ve used. Regardless of the skincare products you use, this tool maximizes the value of those products simply by improving the absorption into your skin! I cannot recommend this product enough - even for the girlies that were blessed with beautiful skin and keep the routine simple! It will STILL make a difference in your skin, promise. 10/10 highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the packaging and this product! Definitely be careful if using if you have sensitive skin. Overall, I really enjoyed using it and the eye cream. WIll definitely continue in my skin care routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying I am a HUGE fan of Beauty Bio.  This Eye Want It All Set is the cherry on top to my skin routine.  The Glo Pro tool truly does exactly what Beauty Bio advertises.  The tiny, painless needles prepare your skin to soak in the quench.  I have mature skin and this duo is a game changer for my fine lines around my eyes.  The price is a little steep but worth every penny!!!  I would highly recommend this set!
I have been using this product for over 2 weeks now and can definitely see a difference! The lines around my eyes have decreased and my eyes look so much brighter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin feels so refreshed after using this product. I highly recommend adding the eye microneedling set to your skin care routine. I can tell a difference and it is so easy to use!

reviews.review_title: Definitely get this for your eyes!
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this for 2 weeks and noticed the swelling under my eyes have gone down noticeably. Wonderful product! Would highly recommend.

This Beauty Bio set is a game changer! I have been using all of the products for 2 weeks. I see a noticeable difference around my eyes - they look brighter, less lines and nourished from the eye cream!  I love the results and I know you will too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great! A must have if you struggle with melasma. After pregnancy Iu2019ve had a significant discoloration around my eyes and this product has made my skin tone more even after a few weeks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this set for several weeks I can definitely say it is SO worth it. It is incredible how quickly my skincare absorbs into my skin after using the micro needling tool. l have seen such a difference in my skin texture after continuous use and Iu2019m really happy with the results so far! The eye cream has also been an amazing addition to my routine, especially since I have very puffy and dark under eyes. Love everything BeautyBio, would definitely recommend to all!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the u201cEye Want It Allu201d kit from Beauty Bio, and it exceeded my expectations. The products worked really well, providing noticeable improvements in the appearance of my eye area. My skin felt smoother, and I saw a reduction in puffiness and dark circles. I highly recommend this kit to anyone looking for effective eye care solutions!

reviews.review_title: Great product for skin care buffs
reviews.review_text: After a few weeks I noticed that the tool helped lighten acne scars and I like using it right before applying my other skin care products. I wouldnu2019t recommend this for people with very sensitive or drier skin. This tool is fantastic for people with a more high-maintenance skin care routine, and it works when consistently used. The packaging and the eye cream are A++++ as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I struggle with uneven skin tone and dark spots. After using this product for the last two weeks, I have noticed brightening and improvement in my skin tone! Also, it has softened the crow's feet around my eyes. The tool is easy to use and it will be a staple in my nightly routine.

This is a must have!! Iu2019ve used it for the past few weeks and have noticed a significant difference in fine lines and texture of my skin. Packaging is also super cute so it would make a perfect gift!

reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried most brands on the market and was thinking only option was Botox. Someone in the store introduced me to this brand and Iu2019m glad they did, my skin is so much better even though Iu2019ve only been using it for a month. Well worth trying.
